definition: to carry on a clandestine love affair

sentences.english: Sleeping with an ex is the sexual slip-up people most commonly expect to get away with.
sentences.chinese: 与前任偷情是最多数人想抹掉的性错误。

sentences.english: He and his wife Lubin Clandestine Affair yet fallen in love with the daughter Yilanni.
sentences.chinese: 他与鲁滨太太偷情却又爱上了她的女儿伊兰妮。

sentences.english: Secret flying is like secret love. You do it, you don’t tell people about it.
sentences.chinese: 偷着飞行就像偷情，你做了，但不会告诉别人。

sentences.english: If you're two-timing me, I'll kill you I swear.
sentences.chinese: 如果你背着我偷情，我发誓会杀了你。

sentences.english: Secret flying is like secret love.You do it, you don't tell people about it.
sentences.chinese: 偷着飞行就像偷情，你做了，但不会告诉别人。

sentences.english: Husband: Mr. Black has been getting a little on the side.
sentences.chinese: 布莱克先生一直在偷情。

sentences.english: If the affair is known or strongly suspected, you’re better off telling.
sentences.chinese: 如果偷情被知道或坚定不移地怀疑，你最好还是坦白。

sentences.english: People always talk about the moral hazards of cheating.
sentences.chinese: 人们总是说偷情会受到良心的谴责。

sentences.english: Life is short. Have an affair.
If the affair is known or strongly suspected, you're better off telling.
sentences.chinese: 如果偷情被知道或坚定不移地怀疑，你最好还是坦白。

sentences.english: Facing these two opponent dicks, are you also stirred by sort of pleasure as amour?
sentences.chinese: 面对敌我两种关系，你是否也激荡过类似偷情的欢愉？

sentences.english: Have you seen the movie, Closer, yet?
sentences.chinese: 你看过《偷情》这部电影了吗？

definition: lit. the red apricot tree leans over the garden wall (idiom)/fig. a wife having an illicit lover
to catch a couple in the act (adultery, illicit sexual relations)
to catch a couple in the act (adultery, illicit sexual relations)
to cheat on one's spouse/to have an affair
a cuckold/to be cuckolded by one's wife
(of a woman) to take a lover
